errors.duplicate-project: %model% *%name%* already exists. I assumed you meant to add to the already existing %model%.
errors.notfound: %modelName% *%name%* doesn't exist, did you mean to create the %model% using `Team > %newSyntax% > %action%`?
errors.duplicate-action: Action *%action%* already exists. I assume you accidentaly tried to add a duplicate action.

actions.refresh: Sent a request to refresh data ðŸ”„

available.now: As far as I know, he should be available right now.
available.range: He should be available between %start% and %end%.

notify.duplicate: You already have %username% in your notify list!
notify.notfound: You don't have %username% in your notify list!

modify.date_not_understood:
Sorry, but I could not understand the date *%date%*.
You might want to take a look at `help schedules`.
modify.in: Okay, I see that you are going to be available from *%start%* until *%end%*. :thumbsup:
modify.out: Okay, I see that you are not going to be available from *%start%* until *%end%*. :thumbsup:
modify.shift: Okay, I see that you are not going to be available from *%unavailable.start%* until *%unavailable.end%*, but you will be available from *%available.start%* until *%available.end%*. :thumbsup:
